song.title: Jesus Only Jesus
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .C F
[1] . C Who has the power to raise the dead . Am Who can save us from our sin . F C/E He is our hope, our righteousness .Dm G C Jesus, only Jesus
[2] . C Who can make the blind to see . Am Who holds the keys that set us free . F C/E He paid it all to bring us peace .Dm G C Jesus, only Jesus
[C] .F C/E Holy, King, Almighty Lord .F C C/E Saints and angels all adore . F C/E I join with them and bow before .Dm G C Jesus, only Jesus
--- [3] . C Who can command the highest praise . Am Who has the name above all names . F C/E You stand alone, I stand amazed .Dm G C Jesus, only Jesus
[B] .F C/E You will command the highest praise .F C/E Yours is the Name above all names || .Dm C/E You stand alone, I stand amazed .F G Am Jesus, only Jesus .F G C Jesus, only Jesus
song.author: Matt Redman
